channel.title: Need help with client downloading
channel.description: I need help, I dont know if this is where this belongs. But when I download a client something always pops up that asks me what I want to open the file with, I can't get around it I need help, I am not really good with computers so you'll have to bear with me. Any suggestions? And I have the Moparscape 3.2 w/ Aryan Client and it freezes on servers sometimes alot.

item.title: Need help with client downloading
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Show pictures of when it asks you what you want to open it with. I’m guessing you haven’t extracted?

Read full topic
